TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AddressFilterMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the type of match semantics used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.

span.span: Specifies the type of match semantics used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L'énumération est définie sur la propriété .The value of the enumeration is set on the property. Le critère de correspondance de préfixe plus long spécifié par le préfixe nécessite que l’adresse de destination est mis en correspondance par le plus grand nombre de bits adresse de début dans le filtre.The longest prefix match criterion specified by Prefix requires that the destination address be matched by the largest number of leading address bits in the filter. La valeur par défaut est Exact.The default value is Exact. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_AddressFilter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_addressfilter/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_AddressFilter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_addressfilter/vb/service.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Any = int32(2)

summary.span: Indicates a filter that matches on any address of an incoming message.

span.span: Indicates a filter that matches on any address of an incoming message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L'utilisation de cette valeur désactive le contrôle de filtre d'adresse [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)].Using this value turns off the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] address filter check. Tout message est accepté, quel que soit son identité WS-Adressing:To.Any message, no matter what its WS-Adressing:To identity is accepted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Exact = int32(0)

summary.span: Indicates a filter that does an exact match on the address of an incoming message.

span.span: Indicates a filter that does an exact match on the address of an incoming message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode Prefix = int32(1)

summary.span: Indicates a filter does the longest prefix matches on the address of an incoming message.

span.span: Indicates a filter does the longest prefix matches on the address of an incoming message.
